item.title: Tooltips and Toggletips
item.description: Applicable WCAG 2.1 Success Criteria 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (level A) 2.1.1 Keyboard (level A) 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value (level A) Functionality So, what functionality do we want from a tooltip? Tooltip should appear when a button is hovered over with mouse, AND when it recieves keyboard focus. The tooltip text needs to be available to screen readers.
